main event: A civilian observed a solid object with colors of yellow, red, and green that continuously circled over Dayton, Ohio for 45 minutes, with flashing lights of red, green, and yellow.
interesting points: The object was occasionally observed through clouds during the observation.
The object had a soft visible haze around it.
The object made three circles over the Dayton area.
The observer was unable to estimate the speed or distance of the object.
The object did not disappear while being observed.
sighted object: A solid object with colors of yellow, red, and green, and flashing lights
